Author: Elllliiiizzzaabeth
Text: I turn on music and the shower and cleanup super well but honestly the crippling fear of being exposed kinda helps me resist purging

Author: nichole442
Text: That was meee! There was no way I could ever do it in front of them so... Grab gallon ziplock bags and baby wipes and do it somewhere private like your room or your car.  I smoked ( they didn't) so my car was the go to and they always thought I was just going for a cigarette ðŸ¤£
